description:
Rounds a number to the specified precision (the number of digits in a decimal number). The precision can range from 0 to 28. If you omit this parameter, Math.round() rounds to the nearest integer. omit this parameter, Math.round() rounds to the nearest integer. 
 trace(MathUtil.round(3.14159, 3)) // 3.142
 trace(MathUtil.round(3.14159, 2)) // 3.14
 trace(MathUtil.round(3.14159, 1)) // 3.1
 trace(MathUtil.round(3.14159, 0)) // 3
 trace(MathUtil.round(3.14159, -1)) // 0
 trace(MathUtil.round(314159, -2)) // 314200
 trace(MathUtil.round(314159, -3)) // 314000
 trace(MathUtil.round(314159, -4)) // 310000

values: precision The number of decimal places to which to round. If you
